page.title: 11Hoole Tennis Club(1)
page.content: Hoole Tennis Club was formed over thirty years ago.When it started it had just one team in the Southport District League. Now it fields two teams in that league and another in the South Ribble League. The area that the club covers is limited to three courts because the land it is situated on and the neighbouring bowling club are owned by the village. Nowadays the club has about a hundred and twenty members including juniors. Each year the senior members arrange coaching for the juniors.The courses last up to ten weeks. In September there is a junior competition arranged in age groups from Under 13 to Under 15. Members range in ages from seven to over sixty. Membership costs five pounds per year and each lesson costs fifty pence.(Contd.)
